verses.kjv: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
verses.web: The sons of Judah: Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.
verses.ct: The sons of Judah were Pharez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.

verses.kjv: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.web: Reaiah the son of Shobal became the father of Jahath; and Jahath became the father of Ahumai and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.ct: Reaiah son of Shobal was the father of Jahath, and Jahath was the father of Ahumai and Lahad. These were the families of the Zorathites.

verses.kjv: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
verses.web: These were the sons of the father of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash. The name of their sister was Hazzelelponi.
verses.ct: These were the sons of the founder of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash. Their sister's name was Hazelelponi.

verses.kjv: And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.web: Penuel was the father of Gedor and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.ct: Penuel was the father of Gedor, and Ezer was the father of Hushah. These were the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah and founder of Bethlehem.

verses.kjv: And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
verses.web: Ashhur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
verses.ct: Ashur, the founder of Tekoa, had 2 wives: Helah and Naarah.

verses.kjv: And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
verses.web: Naarah bore him Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
verses.ct: Naarah gave him Ahuzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were Naarah's sons.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
verses.web: The sons of Helah were Zereth, Izhar, and Ethnan.
verses.ct: Helah's sons were Zereth, Jezoar, and Ethnan.

verses.kjv: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
verses.web: Hakkoz became the father of Anub, Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
verses.ct: Coz was the father of Anub, Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel son of Harum.

verses.kjv: And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.
verses.web: Jabez was more honorable than his brothers. His mother named him Jabez, saying, “Because I bore him with sorrow.”
verses.ct: Jabez was more respected than any of his brothers. His mother named him Jabez, saying, "I gave birth to him in great pain."

verses.kjv: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
verses.web: Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, “Oh that you would bless me indeed, and enlarge my border! May your hand be with me, and may you keep me from evil, that I may not cause pain!” God granted him that which he requested.
verses.ct: Jabez prayed to the God of Israel, "Please bless me and expand my territory! Let your hand be with me, and keep me from evil so that I won't suffer pain." And God gave him exactly what he asked for.

verses.kjv: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
verses.web: Chelub the brother of Shuhah became the father of Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.
verses.ct: Chelub, the brother of Shuah, was the father of Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.

verses.kjv: And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.
verses.web: Eshton became the father of Beth Rapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir Nahash. These are the men of Recah.
verses.ct: Eshton was the father of Bethrapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah, who founded Irnahash. These were the men of Rechah.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
verses.web: The sons of Kenaz: Othniel and Seraiah. The sons of Othniel: Hathath.
verses.ct: The sons of Kenaz were Othniel and Seraiah. Othniel's son was Hathath.

verses.kjv: And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.
verses.web: Meonothai became the father of Ophrah: and Seraiah became the father of Joab the father of Ge Harashim; for they were craftsmen.
verses.ct: Meonothai was the father of Ophrah. Seraiah was the father of Joab, who founded the Valley of Charashim — it got that name because its people were craftsmen.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
verses.web: The sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam. The son of Elah: Kenaz.
verses.ct: The sons of Caleb son of Jephunneh were Iru, Elah, and Naam. Elah's son was Kenaz.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
verses.web: The sons of Jehallelel: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.
verses.ct: The sons of Jehaleleel were Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.web: The sons of Ezrah: Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon; and she bore Miriam, Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.ct: The sons of Ezra were Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon. Mered's wife gave birth to Miriam, Shammai, and Ishbah, who founded Eshtemoa.

verses.kjv: And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.
verses.web: His wife the Jewess bore Jered the father of Gedor, Heber the father of Soco, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. These are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered took.
verses.ct: His Jewish wife gave birth to Jered the founder of Gedor, Heber the founder of Socho, and Jekuthiel the founder of Zanoah. The others were sons of Bithiah, the daughter of Pharaoh, whom Mered had married.

verses.kjv: And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
verses.web: The sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham, were the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maacathite.
verses.ct: The sons of Hodiah's wife, the sister of Naham, were the founders of Keilah the Garmite and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Benzoheth.
verses.web: The sons of Shimon: Amnon, Rinnah, Ben Hanan, and Tilon. The sons of Ishi: Zoheth, and Ben Zoheth.
verses.ct: The sons of Shimon were Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. The sons of Ishi were Zoheth and Benzoheth.

verses.kjv: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
verses.web: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah: Er the father of Lecah, Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of those who worked fine linen, of the house of Ashbea;
verses.ct: The sons of Shelah son of Judah were Er the founder of Lecah, Laadah the founder of Mareshah, and the families of linen workers from the house of Ashbea.

verses.kjv: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And these are ancient things.
verses.web: and Jokim, and the men of Cozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. These records are ancient.
verses.ct: There were also Jokim, the men of Chozeba, Joash, and Saraph, who ruled in Moab, and Jashubilehem. These records are very ancient.

verses.kjv: These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
verses.web: These were the potters, and the inhabitants of Netaim and Gederah: they lived there with the king for his work.
verses.ct: These were the potters and the people who lived in Netaim and Gederah. They lived there and worked directly for the king.

verses.kjv: The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
verses.web: The sons of Simeon: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Shaul;
verses.ct: The sons of Simeon were Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul.

verses.kjv: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
verses.web: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, and Mishma his son.
verses.ct: Shaul's son was Shallum, whose son was Mibsam, whose son was Mishma.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
verses.web: The sons of Mishma: Hammuel his son, Zaccur his son, Shimei his son.
verses.ct: Mishma's descendants were his son Hamuel, whose son was Zacchur, whose son was Shimei.

verses.kjv: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
verses.web: Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brothers didn’t have many children, and all their family didn’t multiply like the children of Judah.
verses.ct: Shimei had 16 sons and 6 daughters, but his brothers didn't have many children. So their entire clan never grew as large as the tribe of Judah.

verses.kjv: And they dwelt at Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazarshual,
verses.web: They lived at Beersheba, Moladah, Hazarshual,
verses.ct: They settled in Beersheba, Moladah, Hazarshual,

verses.kjv: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
verses.web: at Bilhah, at Ezem, at Tolad,
verses.ct: Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,

verses.kjv: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
verses.web: at Bethuel, at Hormah, at Ziklag,
verses.ct: Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,

verses.kjv: And at Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusim, and at Bethbirei, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
verses.web: at Beth Marcaboth, Hazar Susim, at Beth Biri, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities until David’s reign.
verses.ct: Bethmarcaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethbirei, and Shaaraim. These were their cities until the reign of David.

verses.kjv: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:
verses.web: Their villages were Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, and Ashan, five cities;
verses.ct: Their surrounding villages included Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, and Ashan — 5 cities in all.

verses.kjv: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
verses.web: and all their villages that were around the same cities, to Baal. These were their settlements, and they have their genealogy.
verses.ct: They also had all the villages surrounding these cities, stretching as far as Baal. These were their settlements, and they kept careful genealogical records.

verses.kjv: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah, the son of Amaziah,
verses.web: Meshobab, Jamlech, Joshah the son of Amaziah,
verses.ct: Their leaders included Meshobab, Jamlech, Joshah son of Amaziah,

verses.kjv: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
verses.web: Joel, Jehu the son of Joshibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
verses.ct: Joel, Jehu son of Josibiah son of Seraiah son of Asiel,

verses.kjv: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
verses.web: Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
verses.ct: Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,

verses.kjv: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
verses.web: and Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah—
verses.ct: and Ziza son of Shiphi, son of Allon, son of Jedaiah, son of Shimri, son of Shemaiah.

verses.kjv: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
verses.web: these mentioned by name were princes in their families. Their fathers’ houses increased greatly.
verses.ct: All these men listed by name were leaders of their clans, and their families grew very large.

verses.kjv: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
verses.web: They went to the entrance of Gedor, even to the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
verses.ct: They traveled to the outskirts of Gedor, all the way to the east side of the valley, searching for pastureland for their flocks.

verses.kjv: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.
verses.web: They found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceful; for those who lived there before were descended from Ham.
verses.ct: They found rich, lush pastures there. The land was spacious, quiet, and peaceful. The people who had lived there before were descendants of Ham.

verses.kjv: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.web: These written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and struck their tents. The Meunim who were found there, and they destroyed them utterly to this day, and lived in their place; because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.ct: During the reign of King Hezekiah of Judah, the men listed above attacked the tents and settlements they found there, completely destroying the inhabitants to this day. Then they settled in their place, because the pastureland was perfect for their flocks.

verses.kjv: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
verses.web: Some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to Mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
verses.ct: Another group of 500 men from the tribe of Simeon marched to Mount Seir, led by Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel — all sons of Ishi.

verses.kjv: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
verses.web: They struck the remnant of the Amalekites who escaped, and have lived there to this day.
verses.ct: They wiped out the remaining Amalekites who had escaped earlier attacks, and they've lived there ever since.
